notes.listening-notes:
SAMPLE NOTES
PROBLEM: two students with different work styles have been assigned to work together
woman (Lynn):
likes to get work done early
wants both of them to start now
has prepared a schedule for both of them
man (John):
likes to take time getting work done
wants to start maybe next week
does not seem impressed with her schedule
suggests dividing tasks and each working alone
opinion:
her desire to get work done early is admirable
she wants to impose her work habits on him
his suggestion will help get work done
two people working together have to find way to work together
